main event: A witness observed a red fireball object moving from horizon to horizon in 2 minutes over W. Jefferson, Ohio on September 27, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as a red fireball going on a southwest course.
The object moved from horizon to horizon in just 2 minutes.
The witness was unable to provide an evaluation, indicating the sighting was unexplained.
The report is a Project Blue Book record card, suggesting this was part of the U.S. Air Force's historical investigation of unidentified aerial phenomena.
The report does not include any photographs, only a hand-drawn sketch of a circular disc-shaped object.
